Name: Requiring the creation of a database of subsurface conditions to support better engineering of geothermal heat pumps.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the creation of a database of subsurface conditions to support better engineering of geothermal heat pumps
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

Summary: This bill would require the creation of a database as a single place for geological logs of the cityâ€™s geothermal bores and locations of geothermal energy system installations.  The database would also include locations of any and all water wells including unused privately owned wells. This database shall be updated annually.
